Appeal from the United States District Court for the Central District of California Maame Ewusi-Mensah Frimpong, District Judge, Presiding
PEDRO VASQUEZ PERDOMO et al., Plaintiffs - Appellees, v. KRISTI NOEM, Secretary, Department of Homeland Security, et al., Defendants - Appellants.
Before: Ronald M. Gould, Marsha S. Berzon, and Jennifer Sung, Circuit Judges.

extracted.value: Appeal: Defendants appealed to Ninth Circuit Court of Appeals

evidence.source_document: Memorandum Opinion and Order Granting Petitioner Osorto's Ex Parte Application for Release from Immigration Custody
evidence.text: No case consolidation is mentioned. The Docket references related cases (e.g., Bautista v. Santacruz, Jr., case no. 5:25-cv-01873-SSS-BFM), but these are cited as separate cases, not consolidated matters.
the court grants the ex parte application for release

extracted.value: Court granted ex parte application for release on bond

evidence.text: No settlement dates or settlement-related events are mentioned in any case documents. The case involves a TRO (temporary restraining order) and its appeal, not a settlement agreement. All documents reference the TRO, not a settlement.
Dated: July 30, 2025
the court orders that petitioner be released from custody upon the posting of a $5,000 bond, and with the condition that he be placed on location monitoring with an ankle monitor

extracted.value: 07/30/2025: Release on bond with $5,000 bond and ankle monitor

evidence.text: No settlement exists to dispute. The case involves a TRO, not a settlement. Order (002) discusses disputes over the TRO's stay, not settlement enforcement.
federal agents approached, he tried to run but stopped when an agent pointed a taser at his head... handcuffed... no warrant... failed to show a warrant... no notice of being immigration officers
blood pressure reading of 190 and is experiencing dizziness, headaches, confusion, and burned, peeling skin

extracted.value: Detention without proper procedure (no warrant, no notice) leading to health deterioration (high blood pressure, dizziness, headaches).
